item.title: A Fast Convoluted Story: Scaling Probabilistic Inference for Integer Arithmetics
item.description: Revolutionizing probabilistic inference, PLIA‚ÇÅ uses tensor operations and FFT to scale integer arithmetic, achieving orders-of-magnitude speedup in inference and learning times.

item.title: Credal Deep Ensembles for Uncertainty Quantification
item.description: Credal Deep Ensembles (CreDEs) improve uncertainty quantification in deep learning by predicting probability intervals, enhancing accuracy and calibration, particularly for out-of-distribution data.

item.title: Faster Repeated Evasion Attacks in Tree Ensembles
item.description: Speed up repeated evasion attacks on tree ensembles by 36x using feature perturbation insights!

item.title: Interpretable Concept-Based Memory Reasoning
